Replace.Text: Thatched cottage

The residence of the famous genius magician Xiao Tail Nanami was converted into a museum after his mysterious disappearance. It is said that people who call themselves "Babao Fan" come to visit from time to time.

Featured building: Thatched cottage
A specialty building that replaces the Shelter, appearing earlier and cheaper
Unique unit: Guardian Mage
A special unit that replaces archers. It can be recruited at the beginning and is cheaper. Its combat effectiveness can be enhanced over time.

The magician who has guarded the "Glory Grass" for generations is a reserve member of Balan City's magic team. Very eager to learn and able to apply knowledge into battle.
Guardian Magician
knowledge is power
Applying the newly learned knowledge to combat can greatly improve combat effectiveness.
+15[ICON_Strength] combat strength, defense on land that needs protection
+5[ICON_Strength] combat power, the power of the starry sky increases the upper limit of magic power
+5[ICON_Strength] combat strength, mathematics can make magic more accurate
+10[ICON_Strength] combat effectiveness, education improves the quality of members
+10[ICON_Strength] combat strength, the power of faith strengthens the power of magic
+10[ICON_Strength] combat strength, study of nature simplifies the steps of casting spells
+10[ICON_Strength] combat strength, the power of faith strengthens the power of magic
+10[ICON_Strength] combat power, the emergence of "scientific magic" makes magic more powerful
+10[ICON_Strength] combat strength, the belief in protecting nature makes us stronger
+10[ICON_Strength] combat power, preventing global warming is protecting nature
The civilization led by Little Tail Qifan relies on culture to win

The civilization led by Little Tail Qifan has higher attractive plots and a later tourism performance bonus, so it can win the cultural victory. Of course, another way to play is to use Qifan’s strong early advantage in adding unimproved land to complete the conquest victory.
{LOC_LOADING_INFO_LEADER_QIFAN}

The villagers in Guxiu Village are all Setaria tribe, the oldest ethnic group on Kusa Island. It is said that it is to protect the existence of the "Glory Grass" race. The Setaria clan needs to protect it for generations to ensure the safety of Kusa Island, and the magic team in Balan City also has the buff of innate magic bonus. Many of them are magicians in our Guxiu Village (beat your chest!!!) [NEWLINE] Guxiu Village is a very remote place on Kusa Island, and its economic level has always been very low. However, due to the advantage of the topography of the mountains and rivers, everyone in the village They are all self-sufficient ~ (Author's note: The above full text comes from Qifan's column, please find Qifan for typos)
